required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of ThisCART7 in Patients With Refractory or Relapsed T Cell Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Clinical Activity of Allogeneic CAR-T Targeting CD7 in Patients With Refractory or Relapsed T Cell Malignancies

collaborator.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of University of Science and Technology of China

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single dose escalation study to evaluate the safety and clinical activity of ThisCART7(Allogeneic CAR-T targeting CD7) in patients with refractory or relapsed CD7 positive T cell malignancies.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single-center, nonrandomized, open-label, dose-escalation study to evaluate the safety and clinical activity of ThisCART7 in patients with refractory or relapsed CD7 positive T cell malignancies, such as T-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia, T-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Lymphoma and T-cell Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma. The dose range is 0.5-6 x 10^6 cells per kg body weight.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-related grade≥3Adverse Events or SAE
primary_outcome.description: Therapy-related adverse events or SAE will be recorded and assessed according to the National Cancer Institute's Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE, Version 5.0).

other_outcome.description: The interval between administration and disease progression or death.
The interval between administration and death caused by any reason.
EFS is calculated from administration to death, progression of the disease, relapse or gene recurrence, whichever comes first, or last visit.

arm_group.description: In this study, allogeneic anti-CD7 CAR T Cells(ThisCART7 cells) is used to treat patients with refractory or relapsed CD7 positive T cell malignancies.

intervention.description: 0.5-6 x 10^6 CAR T cells per kg body weight

overall_official.affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of USTC (Anhui Provincial Hospital)

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of USTC (Anhui Provincial Hospital)
